name: Hoverboard - eXtreme Hover-Board Stunt
description:
Hoverboard - eXtreme Hovor-Board Stunt is the game to play for all hoverboard lovers out there.
Your task is to collect all the checkpoints and nos and if you wanted to play free than free mode also available. Amazing realistic graphics with lots of ramps to do stunts

***FEATURES***
* Easy controller
* Realistic acceleration
* Beautiful Graphics
* Realistic sound environment
* Realistic physics
